go_data.justification: Opn4.1 binds to the chromophore 11-cis retinal and functionally couples to a G-protein in HEK293 cells.
Opn4.1 has an absorbance spectrum similar to mouse melanopsin and mediates light-dependent induction of calcium release.
Transcripts for opn4.1 localized to the outermost shell of the INL where horizontal cells are located and in scattered photoreceptor cells.
Transcripts for opn4.1 localized to the outermost shell of the INL where horizontal cells are located.
Opn4.1 mediates light-dependent induction of calcium release and its expression is altered under different light:dark conditions.
The opn4.1 gene shows rhythmic expression but with different waveforms under different light:dark conditions.
